entry.title: Asgard and Mater Cookbooks
entry.content:
Over at StudyBlue, we leverage Chef pretty heavily for automation. Today we just open sourced two Chef cookbooks as a way to give back to the community that has supported us.

Asgard

https://github.com/StudyBlue/chef-asgard

  • Chef cookbook for installing Netflix Asgard.
  • Installs and configures Netflix Asgard with Java 6 and Tomcat 7.
  • Can also proxy via Apache.

Mater

https://github.com/StudyBlue/chef-mater

  • Chef cookbook for installing Mater, a bridge between StatusBoard and Graphite.
  • Includes support for running Mater under Unicorn with Apache as a proxy.
